document.full_text: taking the stand in his own defense in his federal corruption trial, former illinois gov. rod blagojevich on thursday denied allegations that he tried to shake down business executives in exchange for official action during his six years in office.
document.title: former ill. gov. blagojevich takes stand in own defense
lines_and_colors: taking the stand in his own defense in his federal corruption trial, former illinois gov. rod blagojevich on thursday denied allegations that he tried to shake down business executives in exchange for official action during his six years in office.
